macOS 26.0+

```
optional func displayNames(
    forGroups groups: [String],
    using loginManager: ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionLoginManager,
    completion: @escaping ([String : String]) -> Void
)
```



```
optional func displayNames(

) async -> [String : String]
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASAuthorizationProviderExtensionRegistrationHandler/displayNames(forGroups:using:completion:)#discussion)

Request the display names for the supplied group identifiers. The completion key is the identifier and the value is the display name.
